class="more-info-box-link"><svg class="ft-arrow" aria-labelledby="ft-arw-content" role="img"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#bhf_icon-arrow"></use><title id="ft-arw-content">Voltar</title></svg> Voltar</span></div></div><div id="f_link-list"></div><div class="feather-wrapper foot-bottom"><ul class="ft-txt-list"><li class="ft-txt-item"><div class="ft-txt"><strong>Formas de pagamento </strong>Cartões de crédito Submarino, Visa, Aura, MasterCard, Diners Club, Hiper, American Express; Boleto bancário; Débito Online Itaú, Banco do Brasil, Bradesco e Visa Electron.</div></li><li class="ft-txt-item"><div class="ft-txt">Todas as regras e promoções são válidas apenas para produtos vendidos e entregues pelo Submarino. O valor de oferta do produto será garantido após a finalização da compra. Havendo divergência, prevalecerá o menor preço ofertado.</div></li></ul><ul class="certification-list"><li class="certification-it cert-01"><div class="cert-wrapper"><div id="armored_website_02"><param id="aw_preload" value="true"></div><script id="siteBlindado" data-src="//selo.siteblindado.com/aw.js"></script></div></li><li class="certification-it cert-02"><svg class="ft-icon-cert-procon" aria-labelledby="ft-icon-cert-procon" role="img"><use xlink:href="#bhf_icon-procon-rj"></use><title id="ft-icon-bs">Instituto Municipal e Defesa do Consumidor - Procon Carioca - Selo de Qualidade 2018</title></svg></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div id="footer-bottom"><div id="f_bottom"><div class="ft-bottom-wrp"><div id="f_social" class=""><!-- <div class="feather-wrapper"> --><div id="social-wrapper"><!-- <div class="ft-title">Conecte-se conosco</div> --><ul class="sc-list"><li class="sc-item gg"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/Canalsubmarino" rel="nofollow" class="h_btn h_btn-secondary rp rp-secondary social-link" title="Youtube" target="_blank"><svg class="ft-icon-social" aria-labelledby="ft-icon-gg" role="img"><use xlink:href="#bhf_icon-social-youtube"></use><title id="ft-icon-gg">Youtube</title></svg></a></li><li class="sc-item fb"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/submarino/" rel="nofollow" class="h_btn h_btn-secondary rp rp-secondary social-link" title="Facebook" target="_blank"><svg class="ft-icon-social" aria-labelledby="ft-icon-fb" role="img"><use xlink:href="#bhf_icon-social-facebook"></use><title id="ft-icon-fb">Facebook</title></svg></a></li><li class="sc-item it"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/submarino/" rel="nofollow" class="h_btn h_btn-secondary rp rp-secondary social-link" title="Instagram" target="_blank"><svg class="ft-icon-social" aria-labelledby="ft-icon-it" role="img"><use xlink:href="#bhf_icon-social-instagram"></use><title id="ft-icon-it">Instagram</title></svg></a></li><li class="sc-item tw"><a href="https://twitter.com/submarino/" rel="nofollow" class="h_btn h_btn-secondary rp rp-secondary social-link" title="Twitter" target="_blank"><svg class="ft-icon-social" aria-labelledby="ft-icon-tw" role="img"><use xlink:href="#bhf_icon-social-twitter"></use><title id="ft-icon-tw">Twitter</title></svg></a></li></ul></div><!-- </div> --></div><div id="ft-svg" class="slogan-wrp"></div><div class="legal-wrp"><address class="ft-address">B2W -
